input.name: file
input.description: The file to be converted to text.

input.name: encoding
input.description:
The method of converting the file's data. 
Supported encodings are: `ascii`, `base64`, `binary`, `hex`, `ucs2`, `utf8`, or `latin1` 
If unspecified, defaults to `utf8`

output.name: text
output.description: The contents of the file as text.
